title: Here to Slay with Shea Couleé
itunes:title: Here to Slay with Shea Couleé
description:
This week Ku and Su are joined by entrepreneur, musician, podcaster and RuPaul’s Drag Race All Stars winner Shea Couleé. She gives us all of the beauty products we need to look flawless, plus a hot tip on the best bathtub in Chicago. Speaking of baths – Shea tells us about her two newest products in collab with the Quiet Girl Shoppe – the $100,000 bar and her Slay Butter. 

 

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

 

To see all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. To purchase any of the products, see below. 

 

  • Check our the moisturizing and nourishing Slay Butter and 100,000 bar from Shea and The Quiet Girl Shoppe 
  • Shea loves the Preserve the Serve Luminous Setting Spray from Patrick Starr’s beauty line One Size Beauty (She also loves the One Size Makeup Remover Wipes)
  • Want to try a new face mask? Check out the Chin Lift Peptide & Niacinamide Sculpting Sheet Mask
  • Shea’s favorite lip gloss is the - Pat McGrath Lust Lip Gloss - Bronze Divinity
  • It will take a while to get this countertop composter, but Shea also loves her Lomi

 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 

 

Joining Lemonada Premium is a great way to support our show and get bonus content. Subscribe today at bit.ly/lemonadapremium. 

 

Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: lemonadamedia.com/sponsors

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
